title: BRIEF-Peregrine Sells 50% Shareholding In Stenham Asset Management For 16 Mln Stg
text:
BRIEF-Peregrine Sells 50% Shareholding In Stenham Asset Management For 16 Mln Stg

Stock Markets 8 minutes ago (Oct 24, 2019 08:48)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Peregrine Sells 50% Shareholding In Stenham Asset Management For 16 Mln Stg Oct 24 (Reuters) - Peregrine Holdings Ltd : * VOLUNTARY ANNOUNCEMENT - SALE OF 50% SHAREHOLDING IN STENHAM ASSET MANAGEMENT HOLDINGS LIMITED * TRANSACTION WHICH VALUES SAM AT GBP16 MILLION * HAD DEAL BEEN IN EFFECT FOR FY ENDED 31 MARCH 2019, IT WOULD RESULT IN 3% REDUCTION IN BOTH HEADLINE EARNINGS, HEPS * UNIT OF PEREGRINE, HAS AGREED IN PRINCIPLE, WITH EFFECT FROM 1 APRIL 2019, TO SELL 50% OF ITS SHAREHOLDING IN SAM TO MANAGEMENT

BRIEF-Peregrine Sells 50% Shareholding In Stenham Asset Management For 16 Mln Stg
description: BRIEF-Peregrine Sells 50% Shareholding In Stenham Asset Management For 16 Mln Stg
